description: Result of data quality measure organizing the measured values as a coverage.

dateTime.description: Date when the result was generated.

spatialRepresentationType.description: Method used to spatially represent the coverage result.

spatialRepresentation.description: Provides the digital representation of data quality measures composing the coverage result.

resultContent.description: Provides the description of the content of the result coverage when the quality coverage is included with the resource being described. i.e. semantic definition of the data quality measures.

resourceFormat.description: Provides information about the format of the result coverage data.

resultFile.description: Provides information about the data file containing the result coverage data.
